CREATE TABLE [pool_table] 
(
    [CorrelationId] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[OperationName] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[EventCategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [datetime] NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[EventInitiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[ResourceType] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[ResourceGroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL
    )

copy into [pool_table] from 'https://datalakedemodp203.blob.core.windows.net/csv/Log.csv'
with (
        file_type = 'CSV',
        CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY='Storage Account Key', SECRET='aTVPvtKPOE2ZdZm8o2uCG42KJM93qYnySCktFMb5TEjQiNbAoTf35s1Ha1ATgAg12cPbXxki7In++AStaTR/Uw=='),
        FIRSTROW=2
)
SELECT * FROM [pool_table]

drop table bikehire_db
CREATE TABLE bikehire_db (
    VendorID INT NULL, 
    tpep_pickup_datetime [datetime] NULL, 
    tpep_dropoff_datetime [datetime] NULL,
    trip_distance INT NULL, 
    PULocationID INT NULL, 
    DOLocationID INT NULL, 
    trip_time VARCHAR (100) NULL,
    trip_speed FLOAT NULL
)

SELECT * FROM [bikehire_db]
